title: Ground News - The US promised to support Ukraine and its people
text:
Summary by Lenta.RU [ðŸ‡·ðŸ‡º-Affiliated] John Kelly , Senior Political Adviser at the US Permanent Mission to the United Nations (UN), said that Washington intends to support Ukraine and will not abandon its people. TASS quotes him as saying. During his speech at a meeting of the UN Security Council, Kelly promised to support Ukraine and its people and stressed that the US would not leave them. â€œWe will not abandon brave Ukrainians who are fighting for their freedom, their country, as wâ€¦ Share menu More
